about_the_game:
By purchasing an officer's package, you will receive unique items, which will allow you to change the design of your tanks:

1. Unique emblem "officer of the first colony"
2. Officer's emblem set (4 pcs.)
3. Four premium camouflage for the following tanks:
- L225 Storm (gold)
- R570 Cyborg (white)
- D4 Diablo (sports)
- FS-189 Saboteur (sky)
4. Two unique camouflages for the following tanks:
- F20 Guardian (veteran)
- GND Dragon (veteran)
5. A unique portrait of an "officer"

You'll also get the following bonuses:
1. 5100 Ares (premium currency)
2. Instant access to two tanks: J02 Mechanic and GND Dragon
3. Increased reward for the battles for a month

Unique content is only available to owners of this package.
detailed_description:
By purchasing an officer's package, you will receive unique items, which will allow you to change the design of your tanks:

1. Unique emblem "officer of the first colony"
2. Officer's emblem set (4 pcs.)
3. Four premium camouflage for the following tanks:
- L225 Storm (gold)
- R570 Cyborg (white)
- D4 Diablo (sports)
- FS-189 Saboteur (sky)
4. Two unique camouflages for the following tanks:
- F20 Guardian (veteran)
- GND Dragon (veteran)
5. A unique portrait of an "officer"

You'll also get the following bonuses:
1. 5100 Ares (premium currency)
2. Instant access to two tanks: J02 Mechanic and GND Dragon
3. Increased reward for the battles for a month

Unique content is only available to owners of this package.

name: ExoTanks - Officer Pack

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows® 7 64-bit / Windows® 8 64-bit / Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i3-3220 or similar
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GT 620 (1GB VRAM) or similar
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 25 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows® 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-4790 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce GTX 1050TI (4 ГБ) / Radeon RX 570 (4 ГБ)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 60 GB available space
